data.title: REVEALED! Kim and Khloe film for The Kardashians’ upcoming season at Anant Ambani
data.meta_description: REVEALED! Kim and Khloe film for The Kardashians’ upcoming season at Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant’s wedding Bollywood News: Latest Bollywood News, Bollywood News Today, Bollywood Celebrity News, Breaking News, Celeb News, Celebrities News, Bollywood News Hindi, Hindi Bollywood News at Bollywood Hungama.com.
data.text:
The world of Bollywood and Hollywood collided at the grand wedding of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant, and the Kardashian sisters were right in the mix! Kim Kardashian and Khloe Kardashian promised fans a glimpse into their Indian adventure through the upcoming season of their reality show, The Kardashians.

REVEALED! Kim and Khloe film for The Kardashians’ upcoming season at Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant’s wedding

Kim and Khloe have been treating their social media followers to snippets of their Mumbai trip. From exploring the city in an autorickshaw to embracing traditional attire for the wedding festivities, the sisters are clearly enjoying their time in India.

A Glimpse into The Kardashians

Kim shared a photo on Instagram Stories featuring her and Khloe in stunning sarees. The caption playfully hinted that their Indian escapade will be part of the upcoming season of The Kardashians. "We're just happy to be lucky enough to travel the world together! And duh we were filming The Kardashians too so you guys can see Kim and Khloe take India," she wrote.

Reality TV Royalty Meets Bollywood Stars

The Ambani wedding boasted a guest list featuring not only Indian celebrities but also international stars. John Cena, singer Rema, former UK prime ministers Tony Blair and Boris Johnson, and Samsung executive chairman Jay Lee were all spotted amongst the attendees.

A Touch of Tradition

For the wedding ceremony, Kim opted for a dazzling red saree with a matching bralette blouse, while Khloe chose a beautiful golden saree. Both sisters looked radiant, embracing Indian fashion with a touch of their signature style. They were even seen accompanying Nita Ambani, wife of Mukesh Ambani and Reliance Foundation Chairperson, during her grand entrance.

The Kardashians: A New Chapter

The Kardashians is a reboot of the long-running reality show Keeping Up With The Kardashians, which ended its 20-season run in 2021. The new show offers viewers a fresh look into the lives of Kim Kardashian, Khloe Kardashian, and their famous family. With five seasons already available on Hulu and Disney+ Hotstar in India, and a sixth season confirmed, fans can expect more exciting adventures like their recent trip to India.

Also Read: Mom-to-Be Deepika Padukone meets Rajinikanth at Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant wedding, watch
